content:
ReadEntityBodyMode Enum

Definition

Specifies constants that indicate how the entity body of an HTTP request has been read.

In this Article

public enum ReadEntityBodyMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ReadEntityBodyMode

Fields

Buffered

The entity body has been read into a Stream object by using the stem.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferedInputStream* method.
Bufferless

The entity body has been read into a Stream object by using the stem.Web.HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream* method.
Classic

The entity body has already been read and its contents have been put into HTTP request collections like stem.Web.HttpRequest.Form*, stem.Web.HttpRequest.Files*, stem.Web.HttpRequest.InputStream*, and stem.Web.HttpRequest.BinaryRead*.
None

The entity body has not been read.
